alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Valleys; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:32PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, east central Butte, northwestern Bonneville, west central Madison and south central Clark Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Northwest Inl to 8 miles southwest of Roberts. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Terreton, Menan, Roberts, Mud Lake, Hamer, Monteview and Sage Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Valleys; Upper Snake River Plain
